ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
AND ( RecordTypeId = '012q00000001foHAAQ',
NOT ( OR( ISPICKVAL(Service_of_Interest__c, 'JN Bank Credit Card'), ISPICKVAL(Service_of_Interest__c, 'JN Bank Auto Loan'), ISPICKVAL(Service_of_Interest__c, 'JN Bank Commercial Auto Loan'), ISPICKVAL(Service_of_Interest__c, 'JN Bank Line Of Credit'), ISPICKVAL(Service_of_Interest__c, 'JN Bank Term Share Loan'), ISPICKVAL(Service_of_Interest__c, 'JN Bank Unsecured Loan'), ISPICKVAL(Service_of_Interest__c, 'JN Bank 12 to 1 Loan (Supersize Loan)'), ISPICKVAL(Service_of_Interest__c, 'JN Bank Cash Secured Loan') ) ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please Update Product To A Credit Facility Related Product
